title: “An absolute buy”
author: VD
content_html:
“Chuck Dixon’s Avalon is an absolute buy for 3 bucks!”

A video review of Chuck Dixon’s Avalon #1: The Street Rules. You can pick up the gold logo edition, and our other print editions, at Arkhaven Direct.
